about_the_game:
Isometric Book

This Isometric themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! All images in this pack are created from a unique isometric perspective.

Contents

The Isometric book unlocks the following images:
  • Pig - 31x33
  • Birds - 69x34
  • Turret - 70x87
  • Boat House - 76x76
  • Waffle Box - 83x89
  • Penrose Staircase - 93x84
  • Tessellation - 100x100
  • Brick - 108x45
  • Cubes - 120x134
  • Temple - 136x121
  • Cold Cabin - 152x162
  • Living Room - 152x164
  • Dungeon - 152x167
  • Tall Tower - 152x274
  • Tree Line - 157x142
  • Office - 197x173
  • Sitting Room - 197x173
  • Suburbs - 230x150
  • Bay Area - 320x201
  • Home - 520x455

Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
